page.title: 12THE JOB OF A HOUSING ADVISOR
page.content: My father, Roger Grenville, works at the housing advice centre at Bath Place. He has been working there for nearly six years. His job entails helping people to find somewhere to live when they move into the area and helping famlies who are in danger of eviction by helping them to find ways of clearing their debts. He also advises people who believe that they are paying too high a rent on rented property. He spends the majority of his time telling people their legal rights and helping them to get them!
